QuestData.Title: Iron Rune Constructs and You: Collecting Data
QuestData.Description: The most important part of your job while controlling the construct is the collection of data. I've placed an iron dwarf relic in the cart over yonder. It's the floating, lightning infused crystal.$B$BGet on the work bench and I'll put you back in the construct. Once you're back in the driver's seat, use the construct's data collection ability to pick up the test data.
QuestData.LogDescription: Walt at the Explorers' League Outpost in the Howling Fjord wants you to use the Iron Rune Construct's Collect Data ability while standing near the Iron Dwarf Relic.$B$BDismiss your construct by dismissing it from the pet window once you have completed the quest.
QuestData.CompletionText: Fits like a glove, don't it?
